title: account permanently suspended
body: my account BuRrss has been permenantly suspended and i dont know why and i have recieved no email. wanted to know if it was due to inactive activity or what. i would really either like my account back or know why it has been suspended. im sorry for whatever i did and sorry for the inconvenience. thank you

replies.body: After looking over your account history, it looks like this ban might have been placed in order to protect your account from some suspicious activity. Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to give you all the context of why this ban was placed and help you get back on the Rift.
Riot did this to me as well. And have yet to give me an explanation. Its been 2 years since i've seen the account they banned.
